SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 Rownum,a.* FROM (SELECT rprojectretailer.RetailerID,rprojectretailer.ProjectID,IFNULL(pointsview.SalesPoint,0) SalesPoint,IFNULL(pointsview.Initpoint,0) Initpoint,IFNULL(pointsview.TotalPoint,0) TotalPoint FROM rprojectretailer LEFT JOIN (SELECT * , SalesPoint+Initpoint TotalPoint FROM generalpointsview) pointsview ON rprojectretailer.RetailerID=pointsview.RetailerID AND rprojectretailer.ProjectID=pointsview.ProjectID WHERE rprojectretailer.ProjectID=#{projectId} ORDER BY pointsview.TotalPoint DESC, rprojectretailer.RetailerID) a, (select @rownum:=0) t
